response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This exceptional item is valued at $15,000 by us, reflecting its quality, uniqueness, and the time invested in its creation. We believe it could be a valuable addition to your collection or business, offering unparalleled benefits and functionality. Considering its worth and the opportunity it presents, we are extending this exclusive offer to you at a price of $14,000. Should you choose to accept, this investment will undoubtedly provide significant returns and satisfaction. We look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 14000}
